metadata.title: CVE-2013-0289 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Isync 0.4 before 1.0.6, does not verify that the server hostname matches adomain name in the subject's Common Name (CN) or subjectAltName field ofthe X.509 certificate, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoofSSL servers via an arbitrary valid certificate.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0289` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

isync - 1.1.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: isync package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.0-2').
